content.question: Based on the context of the passage, what was the most likely fate of Kokurin and his family after he sent the letter?

choices.label: They were either exiled to a gulag or executed.
They were rewarded as loyal communists.
They were allowed to emigrate from the Soviet Union.
They were given back ownership of their farm.

content.answer: They were either exiled to a gulag or executed.
